PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06802024-06-12PS
ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Act
PrecisRe-appointment of CHARLES RANDALL SMITH of Ottawa, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police External Review Committee, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective June 18, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Re-appointment of CHARLES RANDALL SMITH of Ottawa, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police External Review Committee, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective June 18, 2024.
